parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Your Panasonic Comfort Cloud app username

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Your Panasonic Comfort Cloud app password

parameter.name: appVersion
parameter.label: App version
parameter.description: Your Panasonic Comfort Cloud app version code, ie '1.21.0'. You can find this information in the apps section of your mobile phone. If no value provided, it will use the current binding default.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: How often in seconds to fetch updates from Panasonic Comfort Cloud service (polling interval)

parameter.name: deviceId
parameter.label: DeviceId
parameter.description: Typically (but not always) in the form MODEL+SERIAL, ie CS-TZ25WKEW+123456789
